metadata.title: CVE-2022-1920 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Integer overflow in matroskademux element in gst_matroska_demux_add_wvpk_header function which allows a heap overwrite while parsing matroska files. Potential for arbitrary code execution through heap overwrite.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
